details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.13 Implementation limits - Real (min)
details.description: A conforming file shall not contain any real number closer to zero than +/-1.175 x 10^(-38).

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any real number closer to zero than +/-1.175 x 10^(-38).

error.message: Non-zero real value %1 is too close to 0.0
